PHRASE.LANG: You'll always be seen in good company with this Girlfriend companion! She will never let you down: stares at you lovingly, applaudes you, and runs after you. Always by your side, she loves you so much that when she looks at you, little hearts fly up above her head! [#Legal]

Vous serez toujours en bonne compagnie avec cette petite amie! Elle ne vous abandonnera jamais: elle vous suit partout, vous regarde avec admiration, vous applaudit, et vous court après. Toujours à vos côtés, elle vous aime tant que lorsqu'elle vous regarde, des petits coeurs s'envolent de sa tête! [#Legal]

Du wirst immer in guter Gesellschaft mit diesem Freundin Begleiter werden! Sie wird nie im Stich lassen: starrt dich liebevoll, und läuft nach dir. Immer an Ihrer Seite, sie liebt dich so sehr, dass, wenn sie dich anschaut, kleinen Herzen fliegen über den Kopf![#Legal]
Sarai sempre in buona compagnia con la fidanzata! Lei non vi abbandonerà. [#Legal]
Siempre estarás en buena compañía con la novia! Ella nunca te abandonará: te sigue a todas partes, y te mira con admiración. [#Legal]

You'll always be seen in good company with this Girlfriend companion! She will never let you down: stares at you lovingly, applaudes you, and runs after you. Always by your side, she loves you so much that when she looks at you, little hearts fly up above her head! [#Legal]

You'll always be seen in good company with this Girlfriend companion! She will never let you down: stares at you lovingly, applaudes you, and runs after you. Always by your side, she loves you so much that when she looks at you, little hearts fly up above her head! [#Legal]
